thread.title: James Verity
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by James Verity

author: James Verity
title: James Verity
text: Everyone I have dealings with at Public Storage have been great. I deal with customers in my occupation and I know how valuable customer service is. I used Public Storage approximately 15 years ago and did not receive this type of customer service. This is now a completely new experience. Nice job!!
